amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for the National Predisaster Mitigation Fund by $7.655 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Automation Modernization by $7,655,000 and increase funds for the Federal Emergency Management Agency National Predisaster Mitigation Fund by $7,655,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
